name: Ravaging Skies
description:
This game was originally developed as part of Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2020, with the theme "Out of Control". However, we had problems with its submission and we decided to upload it outside the jam workflow.

This game was made in 48 hours.

Gameplay inspired by the classic arcade game Missile Commander, from Atari.

Credits
  • Game Design: Alex Malheiros
  • Programming: Miguel Paolino
  • Sound Design: @leoborges_lb
  • Art: @ianmandarIini
